caption.title: Simulation of the Hong Kong ILI+ time series using the SIR-PF without space reprobing.
caption.p: Simulations were performed for (A) H1N1, including seasonal and pandemic H1N1, (B) H3N2, (C) influenza B, and (D) all strains. Weekly ILI+ observations are shown as ‘x’; the SIR-PF simulated ILI+ are shown by the blue lines.
Click here for additional data file.
